messages.title: JAMES FRITH: 'VOTE LABOUR TO SAVE OUR SERVICES'
messages.content: James Frith vows to fight any further cuts to public services in Bury as damage becomes clear.

messages.title: WE LOVE NHS BURY
messages.content: James Frith says as our MP he would fight to keep Bury Walk-In Centre open as Prestwich closure sparks fresh fears. Town will be left with no service.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: James Frith pledges to fight to keep Bury Walk-In Centre open and opposes any further cuts to public services.

issues.health: James Frith vows to fight any further cuts to public services in Bury; pledges to keep Bury Walk-In Centre open.

endorsements.endorsement: Every budget cut in our councils, every drawing in of the national budget, the damage is showing. Our NHS and social care services are at crisis point. We love the NHS - Bury. Frith has joined Labour's Metro Mayors to build a Greater Manchester that supports all our people - not just a few. Greater Manchester needs a fair deal in parliament. I need MPs like James Frith who are fighting for investment in Bury and beyond.

quotes.text: I oppose any further cuts to public services and bring investment into the NHS and social care.

images.caption: James Frith with supporters holding 'We Love NHS Bury' signs.
James Frith with Mayor Andy Burnham and supporters.
